original_text: These three were the sons of Noah, and from these the people of the whole earth were dispersed.
korean_text: 노아의 이 세 아들로부터 사람들이 온 땅에 퍼지니라

sentences.original_text: These three were the sons of Noah
and from these the people of the whole earth were dispersed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이들로부터 온 세상의 백성들이 흩어졌습니다.
